intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects to initiate the washing cycle of the Samsung dishwasher located in the kitchen by issuing the command "Start the dishwasher."  
Constraints & cues: The dishwasher is currently in a stopped state and is set to use the express washing course. The user has not provided any specific preferences or additional context for the washing cycle.  
Risk assessment: None
